comments:
The three tags create Position categories on the IDocument maintained by BodyContentWriter. However, they do not install a position updater when they create the category. This can result in positions refereing to illegal document locations

An example stack trace.

eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Windows XP x86-32 j9vmwi3223-20070201 (JIT enabled)
J9VM - 20070131_11312_lHdSMR

Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070409.jar eclipse.product=org.eclipse.platform.ide
